description.en: Infinity Token is a deflationary token built on the Ethereum blockchain (ERC-20) set to facilitate the costly process of cryptocurrency mining. The development of a Bitcoin and Ethereum mining farm will have a positive effect on Infinity Token investors through scheduled buy-backs and liquidity injections. $IT will give its investors the benefits of being a part of one of the first ERC-20 tokens to reward holders in Ethereum through proportional redistribution.
